mapper.select: select t.*,qt.id,count(qt.id) as questionCount,count(tl.id) as likeCount from tag t left join question_tag qt on qt.tag_id = t.id left join question q on qt.question_id = q.id left join tag_like tl on t.id = tl.id where qt.tag_id = t.id and q.status = 1 group by t.id
select t.* from tag t left join question_tag qt on qt.tag_id= t.id where qt.question_id=#{questionId} and qt.tag_id= t.id order by create_date desc

select count(*) from tag t
and t.name regexp #{search}
